text: Brian Austin Green (born Brian Green; July 15, 1973) is an Australian born, American actor, producer, and former rapper. He is best known for his role of David Silver on the television series Beverly Hills, 90210 (1990â€“2000). Green was married to actress Megan Fox between 2010 until their divorce in 2021.
